snippet: Several media reports indicated that the man involved in the shooting was carrying two rifles, a bow and a knife.
abstract: Man shoots and kills three members of the Royal Canadian Mounted Police in Moncton, New Brunswick, and wounds two others.
lead_paragraph: Several media reports indicated that the man involved in the shooting was carrying two rifles, a bow and a knife.

headline.main: Man Shoots and Kills 3 Canadian Mounties
headline.print_headline: Man Shoots and Kills 3 Canadian Mounties
